page.title: 15CARNIVAL DAY
page.content:
The carnival is something that happens each year.It is always fun because there are lots of stalls and things happening.There are also many floats. The Brownies won this year for their Gnome Garden float. There were fifteen decorated floats and many people in fancy dress on foot.The procession was led around the town by various jazz bands and finished on the town playing fields, where the winners were awarded their prizes.
On the field there lots of side-shows and attractions.These included a bouncy castle,a Punch and Judy show,Wheel of Fortune,Greasy Pole,motorbikes and two ice cream vans. The motorbikes did not go very fast.
